item.title: Humana对2026年前景持悲观态度，因质量评级下滑拖累业绩
item.description: 周三，健康保险公司Humana预测其年度利润将低于华尔街预期，原因是该公司旗下面向老年人的Medicare Advantage计划评级下降，预计将对其利润造成冲击。【原文：Humana forecast annual profit below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the health insurer expects a hit from lower quality ratings for its Medicare Advantage plans for older adults.】

item.title: 汉莎航空称周四飞行员罢工是无谓的升级
item.description: 德国最大航空集团汉莎航空批评工会计划于周四举行的罢工行动，称其同名核心航空公司没有财务余地满足相关诉求。【原文：Germany's largest airline group Lufthansa criticised unions for a walkout planned on Thursday, saying its namesake core airline has no financial leeway to meet the demands.】

item.title: Instagram负责人将就应用设计及青少年心理健康问题出庭作证
item.description: Instagram负责人将于周三首次出庭接受质询，焦点在于这家Meta旗下应用的设计是否助长了青少年心理健康危机。【原文：Instagram's leader is set to face questions in court for the first time on Wednesday about whether the Meta-owned app's design is fueling a youth mental health crisis.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔分拆公司Solstice预计2026年利润低于预期，因利润率持续承压
item.description: 至日先进材料公司周三预测2026年全年盈利将低于市场预期，这一消息掩盖了其第四季度强劲的销售增长以及核材料和电子材料业务持续走强的态势。【原文：Solstice Advanced Materials forecast full-year 2026 earnings below market estimates on Wednesday, overshadowing solid fourth-quarter sales growth and continued strength in nuclear and electronic materials.】

item.title: 美国银行家称，软件行业抛售潮正扰乱部分并购和IPO交易
item.description: 软件股的广泛抛售正开始阻碍该行业的交易和首次公开募股（IPO），约十余位财务顾问和交易商向路透社表示，市场波动导致估值不可靠，潜在买家持谨慎态度。【原文：A broad selloff in software stocks is starting to stall deal-making and IPOs in the sector as volatility makes valuations unreliable and potential buyers cautious, about a dozen financial advisers and dealmakers told Reuters.】

item.title: 亚马逊药房将把当日达服务扩展至全美约4500个城镇
item.description: 亚马逊的药房业务将在今年年底前将其当日送达处方药服务扩展至美国约4500个城镇，新增近2000个服务社区。【原文：Amazon's pharmacy business will expand its same-day delivery prescription service to about 4,500 cities and towns in the U.S. by the end of this year, adding nearly 2,000 new communities to the network.】

item.title: 美联储将维持利率至五月，但经济学家称沃什可能政策过于宽松
item.description: 路透社对经济学家的调查显示，美联储将在主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔任期剩余时间（即今年5月前）维持关键基准利率不变，但随后将在6月立即降息。【原文：The Federal Reserve will hold its key benchmark rate steady for the rest of Fed chair Jerome Powell's tenure through May but cut immediately afterward in June, according to a Reuters poll of economists.】

item.title: 据《商报》报道，大众汽车考虑在欧洲生产Cupra Tavascan的继任车型
item.description: 据德国《商报》周三援引公司消息人士及内部生产计划报道，德国汽车制造商大众正考虑未来在欧洲而非中国生产其Cupra品牌Tavascan SUV轿跑车的下一代车型。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen is considering building the next model of its Cupra brand's Tavascan SUV coupe in Europe instead of China in future, German newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday, citing company sources and internal production plans.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在1月就业数据公布前暂停波动
item.description: 周三美国股指期货走势平淡，投资者正等待因政府部分停摆而推迟的关键就业数据，同时密切关注企业财报。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Wednesday as investors awaited crucial jobs data, delayed by a partial government shutdown, while keeping a close watch on corporate earnings.】

item.title: 大众汽车达成协议后，中国电动车制造商正谋求开启自己的欧盟关税谈判
item.description: 多位行业内部人士和分析师表示，在大众汽车为其中国制造的Cupra Tavascan SUV争取到突破性的关税豁免后，中国主要汽车制造商将成为下一批敲开布鲁塞尔大门的厂商。【原文：Major Chinese automakers will be next to knock on Brussels' door after Volkswagen secured a breakthrough tariff reprieve for its China-made Cupra Tavascan SUV, multiple industry insiders and analysts said.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称雅各布斯的QXO公司将以22.5亿美元收购科迪亚克，瞄准家得宝和劳氏
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，由亿万富翁交易专家布拉德·雅各布斯领导的建材分销商QXO已同意以约22.5亿美元收购规模较小的私营分销商科迪亚克建材合作伙伴公司。【原文：Building-products distributor QXO , led by billionaire dealmaker Brad Jacobs, has agreed to buy smaller private distributor Kodiak Building Partners for about $2.25 billion, according to two people with direct knowledge of the deal.】

item.title: 美国能源部长即将抵达委内瑞拉，肩负重振石油产业的艰巨任务
item.description: 委内瑞拉本周将接待美国能源部长克里斯·赖特，此次访问标志着近三十年来美国对这个欧佩克国家最高层级的能源政策访问。华盛顿正对其提议重建的石油产业进行首次实地评估。【原文：Venezuela will host U.S. Secretary of Energy Chris Wright this week, marking the highest-level U.S. visit focused on energy policy to the OPEC nation in nearly three decades as Washington conducts its first on-the-ground assessment of the oil industry it is proposing to rebuild.】

item.title: 台湾将派团队评估美国稀土矿藏
item.description: 台湾经济部长龚明新周三表示，台湾计划派遣官员赴美考察稀土矿藏，目标是在岛内实现稀土矿物的精炼加工。【原文：Taiwan plans to send officials to assess U.S. rare earths deposits with a goal to have such minerals refined on the island, Economy Minister Kung Ming-hsin said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫称对Telegram应用的限制源于其违反法律规定
item.description: 克里姆林宫周三表示，Telegram通讯应用必须遵守俄罗斯法律，若该应用未回应监管机构的要求，国家通信监管机构有义务采取行动。【原文：The Kremlin said on Wednesday that the Telegram messenger app had to comply with Russian law and that the state communications regulator was obliged to act if Telegram did not respond to its requests.】

item.title: 独家：印度坚持电子烟禁令，菲莫国际遭冷遇
item.description: 印度已排除放宽电子烟禁令的可能性，该禁令本可允许加热不燃烧烟草产品上市，此举对菲莫国际公司长期游说新德里政府允许此类设备的行为造成打击。【原文：India has ruled out relaxation of a ban on e-cigarettes that would have allowed heat-not-burn tobacco products, dealing a blow to a lengthy private lobbying campaign by Philip Morris International for New Delhi to permit such devices.】

item.title: 欧盟的冯德莱恩重申欧洲亟需简化法规
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩周三表示，欧盟必须简化针对在该地区开展业务的企业所制定的法规，以增强欧盟在与美国和中国等经济体竞争中的竞争力。【原文：The European Union must simplify its regulations on companies doing business in the region in order to make the bloc more competitive against the likes of the United States and China, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 波士顿动力首席执行官即将离任，现代汽车机器人战略备受关注
item.description: 现代汽车集团旗下机器人子公司波士顿动力公司宣布，首席执行官罗伯特·普莱特将卸任。这家总部位于马萨诸塞州沃尔瑟姆的公司通过其X平台账号发布了这一消息。【原文：Robert Playter, chief executive of Hyundai Motor Group's robot affiliate Boston Dynamics is stepping down, the Waltham, Massachusetts-based company said on its X account.】

item.title: 印度Fractal Analytics公司3.14亿美元IPO在最后申购日全额认购
item.description: 分形分析公司3.14亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）——这是印度首家纯粹人工智能公司的上市——在周三最后一个申购日被全额认购。【原文：Fractal Analytics' $314-million initial public offering, the first for a pure-play Indian artificial intelligence firm, was fully subscribed on the final day of bidding on Wednesday.】

item.title: 莫德纳股价下跌，因FDA拒绝审评新型流感疫苗
item.description: 美国食品药品监督管理局拒绝审议莫德纳公司流感疫苗的上市申请后，该公司股票周三在法兰克福股市开盘下跌14%，成交量低迷。【原文：Moderna shares opened 14% lower in Frankfurt on Wednesday in low volume after the U.S. Food and Drug Administration refused to review the company's approval application for its influenza vaccine.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，激进投资者埃利奥特增持伦敦证券交易所集团股份
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三援引知情人士报道，激进投资者埃利奥特已持有伦敦证券交易所集团"大量"股份，并正与该公司展开接触以推动业绩提升。【原文：Activist investor Elliott has built a "significant" stake in the London Stock Exchange Group and is engaging with the company to drive performance, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧元与人民币的全球野心加速美元下跌
item.description: 美元兑欧元和人民币汇率再度走低，恰逢欧美及中国领导人正借美元前景疑云升温之机，着力提升本国货币的全球地位。最新汇率变动似乎正朝着各方预期方向发展，尤其符合华盛顿的利益。【原文：The dollar is sliding again against the euro and yuan, just as European and Chinese leaders are seeking to boost the global role of their currencies, taking advantage of the rising dollar doubts. The latest exchange rate shifts seem to be playing out as desired for all parties, especially Washington.】

item.title: 欧盟将在比利时城堡召开会议，应对与美中两国的经济竞争
item.description: 欧盟领导人周四齐聚比利时一座城堡，商讨如何在全球规则体系日渐瓦解之际，在经济上与中国的全球竞争对手以及美国这个不可靠的盟友抗衡。【原文：European Union leaders gather in a Belgian castle on Thursday to thrash out how they can compete economically with a global rival like China and a less reliable ally like the U.S. as the rules-based world order frays.】

item.title: 欧洲卫星公司为OneWeb卫星采购项目获得10亿欧元融资
item.description: 欧洲卫星通信公司周三宣布，已获得约10亿欧元（12亿美元）的出口信贷融资，用于采购其OneWeb卫星星座所需的低地球轨道卫星。【原文：Eutelsat has secured about 1 billion euros ($1.2 billion) in export credit financing to fund the procurement of low Earth orbit satellites for its OneWeb constellation, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 腾讯与特斯拉携手推出微信车载功能
item.description: 腾讯云周三宣布与美国汽车制造商特斯拉达成合作，将提供车载功能，包括微信位置数据的即时传输以及基于目的地的智能服务建议。【原文：Tencent Cloud said on Wednesday it has partnered with U.S. automaker Tesla to offer in-car features such as instant transfer of WeChat location data and smart services suggestions based on destination.】

item.title: 达索系统全年营收增长，客户转向云软件
item.description: 法国软件制造商达索系统公布2025财年全年营收为62.4亿欧元（约合74.4亿美元），按固定汇率计算增长4%。其中经常性收入增长6%，主要得益于订阅服务收入激增11%——随着更多客户转向云端服务，订阅业务持续扩张。【原文：French software maker Dassault Systèmes reported full-year 2025 revenue of 6.24 billion euros ($7.44 billion), up 4% at constant currency, with recurring revenue growing 6%, driven by an 11% jump in subscriptions as more clients turn to cloud-based services.】

item.title: 施耐德预测2026年营收将温和增长，面临中国市场压力
item.description: 瑞士电梯制造商迅达公司表示，预计2026年以当地货币计价的营收将实现低至中个位数增长，主要市场新装业务的复苏有望抵消关税影响及中国市场的压力。【原文：Swiss lift and escalator maker Schindler said it expects 2026 revenue to grow by low- to mid-single digits in local currencies, anticipating recovering new installations in key markets to offset tariff impacts and pressure in China.】

item.title: 海尼根将裁员6000人，因啤酒需求疲软
item.description: 海尼根周三宣布将裁减全球员工6000人，并下调2026年利润增长预期，该预期低于一年前的预测。这家荷兰啤酒巨头及其同行正面临啤酒需求疲软的困境。【原文：Heineken said on Wednesday it would cut up to 6,000 jobs from its global workforce and set lower expectations for profit growth in 2026 than a year earlier, as the Dutch brewer and its peers grapple with weak demand for beers.】

item.title: 西门子能源利润近翻三倍，得益于燃气轮机和电网需求激增
item.description: 西门子能源周三表示，受燃气轮机和电网设备需求强劲以及陷入困境的风电部门亏损收窄推动，其财年头三个月的净利润几乎翻了两番。【原文：Siemens Energy on Wednesday said net profit nearly tripled in the first three months of its fiscal year, boosted by strong demand for gas turbines and grid equipment as well as a narrower loss at its struggling wind division.】

item.title: 潜艇制造商TKMS订单积压创纪录达220亿美元，上调销售预期
item.description: 德国潜艇制造商TKMS周三表示，其订单积压量已攀升至220亿美元的新高，并上调了销售预期。该公司指出，在当前地缘政治紧张局势加剧的背景下，军舰需求显著增长。【原文：TKMS hit a fresh $22 billion high in order backlog and raised its sales outlook, the German submarine maker said on Wednesday, citing a boost in demand for warships at a time of rising geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 韩国加密货币交易所Bithumb称系统漏洞导致400亿美元错误
item.description: 韩国加密货币交易所Bithumb周三表示，其内部系统存在严重漏洞，不仅可能遭受破坏，更未能阻止上周逾400亿美元资产的错误转移。【原文：South Korea's Bithumb said on Wednesday that serious flaws had left the crypto exchange's internal system susceptible to potential sabotage and failed to prevent an erroneous transfer of more than $40 billion in assets last week.】
